text: Robert Eugene Littell (January 9, 1936 â€“ November 14, 2014) was an American politician. He was a member of the Republican Party. Littell was born in Orange, New Jersey. He served as a member of the New Jersey State Senate from 1992 to 2008. He represented the 15th Legislative District until 1982 and the 24th Legislative District. Before entering the Senate, he served in the New Jersey General Assembly from 1968 to 1992 and the Franklin Borough Council from 1963 to 1965. He was a Delegate to the 1976 Republican National Convention. Littell died in Franklin, New Jersey, aged 78.Robert Littell 40-year NJ lawmaker dies ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2014 deaths Category:People from Orange, New Jersey Category:Politicians from New Jersey Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Robert Littell (politician)
